REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM A f1270 reute u f BC-J.P.-MORGAN-<JPM>-INC 04-02 0048

TEXT.TITLE: J.P. MORGAN <JPM> INCREASES PRIME RATE
TEXT.BODY: J.P. Morgan and Co Inc said it is raising its prime lending rate to 7-3/4 pct from 7-1/2 pct, effective today. Most major U.S. banks are now posting a 7-3/4 pct rate. Citibank was the first to announce an increase on Tuesday. Reuter
